# addChildBehavior(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds a dynamic behavior, as a child, to a custom dynamic behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func addChildBehavior(_ behavior: UIDynamicBehavior)
```

## Parameters

- **behavior**: The dynamic behavior you want to add as a child.

The parent behavior ignores your use of this method if you:

- Provide a `nil` value
- Provide a behavior instance that youâ€™ve already added to the behavior

## Discussion

Call this method only on custom subclasses of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDynamicBehavior] class.

## Configuring a dynamic behavior

- **action**: The block you want to execute during dynamic animation.
- **childBehaviors**: Returns the array of dynamic behaviors that are children of a custom dynamic behavior.
- **removeChildBehavior(_:)**: Removes a child dynamic behavior from a custom dynamic behavior.
